title: looking for a teacher who is gold or higher
body: Hi my IGN is Buzms people usually call me that iv been stuck in bronze for a while with a mixture of many of my own mistakes. I main ADC and my main problems iv been able to spot have been not being able to kite properly and cs they have been the 2 problems that have been noted and i am working on most people have mentioned to me my warding lv is Daimond even though it is cheap as chips to buy a pink ward and blue trinket :/ so idk My champ pool for Adc consists of {{champion:236}} ,{{champion:18}} ,{{champion:429}} ,{{champion:21}}  and Soon to be Jhin. I am willing to work and get to where i need to be iv been playing on a shitty laptop and in a few week ill be buying parts for a new pc and getting it build asap but other than that school might get in the way and i cannot pay for these lessons because im poor af so yea that has been a problem for a while but if you can donate your time to teach me and get me through hell i would highly appreciate it i all willing to lean my mistakes and find the root to my problem and try to improve {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
I do stuff like this.
If you are interested.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI
